entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
